RULES OF SURVIVAL is a free-to-play, action-packed combat game that has taken the gaming world by storm. Developed by NetEase, this game features 120 players on an island who must fight to be the last person standing. It has become one of the most popular battle royale games with over 230 million users worldwide, available on both Android and iOS. In this article, we will discuss everything you need to know about RULES OF SURVIVAL.

## Gameplay

The gameplay of RULES OF SURVIVAL revolves around 120 players being parachuted onto an island and fighting to the death. Players must search for weapons, supplies, and vehicles while attempting to eliminate other players. The game has several modes, including solo, duo, and squad, allowing for customization of the game.

RULES OF SURVIVAL offers breathtaking graphics, an extensive map, and various game modes to keep players engaged. The game features realistic guns, vehicles, and equipment that make players feel like they are in a real-life combat environment.

## Tips and Tricks

Here are some tips and tricks to help you survive and become the last player standing in RULES OF SURVIVAL.

### Choose the Right Landing Spot

Selecting the right landing spot is the first step to surviving in RULES OF SURVIVAL. A good location offers ample supplies, weapons, and equipment to fight other players. Avoid areas with many players as they will be heavily crowded, increasing your chances of dying.

### Gather Resources

After landing, quickly search for supplies, weapons, and equipment. Always keep your inventory organized, and avoid unnecessary items. Further, explore buildings and always be on the lookout for hidden items.

### Stay Alert

RULES OF SURVIVAL is a fast-paced game that can keep you at the edge of your seat. Always be on the lookout for other players, as they can attack you at any moment. Use headphones to hear footsteps and gunshots, giving you an advantage against other players.

### Make Use of Vehicles

Vehicles are a crucial component in RULES OF SURVIVAL as they allow players to move around quickly. However, they can also be dangerous if not used correctly, such as accidentally running into explosive barrels or enemies. Ensure you practice with vehicles before using them in a real game.

### Keep Moving

Staying in one place for too long can be lethal in RULES OF SURVIVAL as players will easily find and eliminate you. Keep moving and remain vigilant while searching for other players.

## Conclusion

RULES OF SURVIVAL is an exciting and addictive game that offers players a thrilling combat experience. To survive in the game, players must be strategic and stay alert while continuously exploring new areas. If you're looking for an adrenaline rush and a chance to dominate your opponents, try RULES OF SURVIVAL today.
